sense.gloss: cutting in two with a single stroke
taking decisive action, dealing with decisively, cutting the (Gordian) knot

sdata.j: もう↑少↑↓すこ↓しやさしく↑意見↑↓いけん↓してあげたらどうなの。↑一刀両断↑↓|いっとうりょうだん|↓のもと↑切↑↓き↓り↑捨↑↓す↓てられた↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑立場↑↓たちば↓も↑考↑↓かんが↓えてよ。
sdata.e: Why don't you try expressing your opinion a little more gently? Think about how he feels getting told flatly that he's being cut loose.
